text: What is a simple way to generate keywords from a text?
I suppose I could take a text and remove high frequency English words from it.
By keywords, I mean that I want to extract words that are most the characterizing of the content of the text (tags ) .
It doesn't have to be perfect, a good approximation is perfect for my needs.
Has anyone done anything like that?
Do you known a Perl or Python library that does that?
Lingua::EN::Tagger is exactly what I asked however I needed a library that could work for french text too.
